mean_cn: n.金属，合金，金属制品；  vt.（以金属）覆盖，装配
mean_en: a substance (such as gold, tin, or copper) that usually has a shiny appearance, is a good conductor of electricity and heat, can be melted, and is usually capable of being shaped
sentence: Wow, these roses are made of metal.
sentence_trans: 哇，这些玫瑰花是金属做的。
